errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred in this component.

welcome.title: Welcome to CC Copilot
welcome.subtitle: Your intelligent coding assistant is ready
welcome.step1: 1. Create Project: Click "New Project" button, select project folder
welcome.step2: 2. Start Conversation: Click "+" button next to project or click on history session
welcome.step3: 3. Switch Channel: One-click switch between different accounts/API channels in status bar
welcome.feature2: Auto-detect Claude Code projects and session history
welcome.feature3: Support multiple official accounts and seamless third-party account switching
welcome.feature4: Quick account/API channel switching without interrupting current conversation
welcome.faq1: How to install Claude Code CLI?
welcome.faq2Answer: Click the account list in status bar to switch between different accounts/API channels
welcome.faq3Answer: Configure proxy in Settings to access Claude.ai network

statusBar.notActivated: Not activated - need to use a history session to activate
statusBar.providerSwitchAlert:
Reminder: Claude official account "{{email}}" is not yet activated.

Please select any history session first to activate this account, otherwise it may not work properly.

settings.title: Settings
settings.detectTimeout: Detection timeout, please ensure Claude CLI is working properly and retry
settings.commandFailed: Claude command execution failed, please check if Claude CLI is correctly installed
settings.noAccountSelected: Please ensure the correct Claude account is selected
settings.networkError: Network or system error occurred during detection, please check application status and retry
settings.claudeRequired: Claude CLI is required for terminal sessions. Install with:
settings.skipPermissionsDesc: Automatically add --dangerously-skip-permissions flag when starting Claude
settings.skipPermissionsWarningDesc: Enabling this option allows Claude to execute operations without asking for user confirmation. Only enable if you trust the code you're working with and understand the security implications.
settings.projectManagementDesc: Projects are automatically discovered from your Claude projects directory. Create new sessions within projects to start coding.
settings.accountVerified: ✓ Account verified and ready to use
settings.accountDetectionDesc: Click "Detect Account" to verify this account is properly configured and available for use with Claude Code.
settings.completeLoginBrowser: Complete the login process in your browser
settings.restartApplication: Restart this application to see the new account
settings.clickDetectAccount: Click "Detect Account" to verify the account is available
settings.name: Name
settings.languageNoteDesc: Language changes take effect immediately. Log messages will remain in English for debugging purposes.

sessions.addProjectToStart: Add a project to get started
sessions.confirmDeleteProject:
⚠️ WARNING: Delete project "{{projectName}}"?

This will:
• Remove the project from CC Copilot
• Delete all associated chat sessions
• Delete Claude project data directory

Directory to be deleted:
{{claudeProjectDir}}

Note: Source code directory {{projectPath}} will NOT be deleted
This action cannot be undone!
